text: Wilbert "Bill" Cobbs (June 16, 1934 â€“ June 25, 2024) was an American movie and television actor. He starred in over 120 movies and television programs. == Personal life == Cobbs was born on June 16, 1934 in Cleveland, Ohio.Bill Cobbs Biography (1935-) Cobbs was the second cousin of American actor James Baskett. == Career == Cobbs' career began during 1974 in the movie The Taking of Pelham One Two Three. He was known for his role in The Bodyguard. Cobbs' latest appearances were in the 2022 film Caroltyn and the 2023 miniseries Incandescent Love. C Cobbs was not married and lived in Upland, California and in New York City, New York. Cobbs died at his home in Upland on June 25, 2024 at the age of 90. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1934 births Category:2024 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Cleveland Category:African-American actors Category:American television actors
title: Bill Cobbs
